sourcesContent:
import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Cart() { const cart = useSelector((store) => store.cart) return (

Shopping Cart

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Your Cart Is Empty

): (

PRODUCT

PRICE

QUANTITY

Total

{cart.cartItems?.map((item)=>{ return (

{item.title}({item.brand})

₹{item.price}

-

{item.cartQuantity}

+

₹{item.price * item.cartQuantity}

) })}

SubTotal:

₹

Continue Shopping

)}
); } export default Cart;
